comments: The game is stopped due to a game clock malfunction. After correcting the clock, the game correctly resumes with Memphis retaining possession.
Kleber (DAL) extends his arm forward and makes contact with Brooks' (MEM) arm as he is entering his upward shooting motion.
Roddy (MEM) makes contact with the ball and with the part of Hardy's (DAL) hand that is on the ball as he defends the driving shot attempt.
Hardy (DAL) is the last player to touch the ball before the ball goes out of bounds. The possession is correctly awarded to Memphis.
Bane (MEM) and Bullock (DAL) briefly engage and disengage off ball as Bane releases away to receive the pass.
Bullock (DAL) brings his hands towards Bane (MEM) and marginal contact occurs as Bane receives the pass.
Bullock (DAL) is moving alongside Bane's (MEM) path and absorbs the marginal contact as he defends the driving shot attempt.
Roddy (MEM) is moving alongside Hardy's (DAL) path and marginal contact occurs during the drive.
Bane (MEM) jumps vertically and is turned in the air as he absorbs the contact from Hardy (DAL) at the end of the drive.

call_type: Turnover:  Out of Bounds - Bad Pass Turn
comments: Bullock (DAL) is the last player to touch the ball before it goes out of bounds.  Possession is correctly awarded to Memphis.
Brooks (MEM) brings his arm toward Green (DAL) as he sets the pick and he absorbs the marginal contact.
Kleber (DAL) is already in Roddy's (MEM) path and marginal contact occurs during the screen.
Brooks (MEM) cleanly dislodges the ball from Hardy (DAL).
Brooks (MEM) is the last player to touch the ball before the ball goes out of bounds.  Possession is correctly awarded to Dallas.
Hardy (DAL) and Roddy (MEM) come together at the same spot, and incidental contact occurs as they attempt to secure the loose ball.
Brooks (MEM) is already in Hardy's (DAL) path and does not deliver illegal contact.
Brooks (MEM) legally contests Green's (DAL) jump shot, making "high-five" contact after the ball is released.
Roddy (MEM) legally contests Hardaway Jr.'s (DAL) jump shot attempt.
Green (DAL) commits a take foul on Jones (MEM).
Bane (MEM) brushes Green's (DAL) arm and marginal contact occurs as Green secures the ball.
Green (DAL) commits a take foul on Jones (MEM).
Hardy (DAL) does not put part of his hand under the ball, and either carry it from one point to another or bring it to a pause and then continue to dribble again.
